articles.description: Former Premier League referee David Coote has said he hid his sexuality during his career, fearing the abuse he would receive for being gay.

articles.description: Six-time NBA All-Star Jimmy Butler is suspended indefinitely by the Miami Heat after a "continued pattern of disregard of team rules".
